Work

Work Day Scheduler

Built With: JavaScript,HTML,CSS

A website which allows you to schedule your workday, save tasks and see which tasks already passed, current and happening soon.

View Project on GitHub

Music Dashboard

Built With: HTML,CSS, Javascript

Motivation for this project was to provide a dashboard where a user could look up their favorite artist and see that artists' latest social media and upcoming events. Our efforts have allowed the user to type in their favorite artist's name and see results from youtube, spotify, twitter, and instagram, along with events shown through the ticketmaster API.

View Project on GitHub
